name: Drift Phonk 666
description:
Drift Phonk 666 is a risk-rewarding physics-based drifting game about collecting phonk tapes and escaping deadly saws. You will master the art of drifting, go through tons of obstacles and collect all the music tapes from hell so people hear how good 𝖒𝖚𝖘𝖎𝖈 sounds.



• Fast-paced gameplay.
• Funky car physics without brakes.
• Unique 𝖆𝖊𝖘𝖙𝖍𝖊𝖍𝖎𝖈.
• Minimalist artstyle.
• 30 handcrafted hardcore levels.
• Original phonk and trap soundtrack.
• DRIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIFT.
• Phonkeram salam, ostalnim soboleznuyiu.
